sentences.en: As a group, today's old people are still relatively deprived.
sentences.cn: 总的来说，当今的老年人依然相对贫困。

sentences.en: He pledged that he would never lie to the American people.
sentences.cn: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

sentences.en: How many people were at the meeting?
I clearly empathize with the people who live in those neighborhoods.
sentences.cn: 我非常同情生活在那些地方的人们。

sentences.en: I hate it when people accuse us of that.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌别人就那件事指责我们。

sentences.en: I picked first all the people who usually were left till last.
sentences.cn: 我先挑出了所有通常留到最后的人。

sentences.en: It's a long way to go for two people in their seventies.
sentences.cn: 对于两个七十几岁的人来说，这段路太远了。

sentences.en: Jackie was running around with all these brilliant people.
sentences.cn: 杰姬混迹于这些才华横溢的人之间。

sentences.en: Lenin lives on in the minds and hearts of millions of people.
sentences.cn: 列宁永远活在亿万人民的心中。

sentences.en: More people would be attracted to cycling if conditions were right.
sentences.cn: 如果天气适宜，会有更多的人被吸引到骑自行车的行列中来。

sentences.en: People always think I'm a fool, and I dare say they're right.
sentences.cn: 人们总认为我是个傻瓜，想必他们是对的。

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentences.en: The car park was absolutely packed solid with people.
sentences.cn: 停车场被人挤得水泄不通。

sentences.en: The criticisms will not stop people flocking to see the film.
sentences.cn: 批评的声音不会阻止人们涌到影院观看这部电影。

sentences.en: the people who live next door
Three mortar shells had landed close to a crowd of people.
Try to get a feeling for the people who live here.
sentences.cn: 试着去理解在这片土地上生息的人们。

sentences.en: You can chat to other people who are online.
sentences.cn: 你可以和其他在线的人聊天。

phrases.tran_cn: [口语](西方世界所谓的)上流社会人士

trans.tran_en: used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children
used as the plural of ‘person’ to refer to men, women, and children
if a country or area is peopled by people of a particular type, they live there

trans.tran_cn: 居住于，布满，使住满人，在…殖民，把动物放养在
